room_title: Escape room "Wizard Hysteria" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: Patton was our wizard and our experience was great! 30 or so puzzles to challenge the Harrry Potter fan! Study up before you go!

room_title: Escape room "Wizard Hysteria" by Alcatraz Escape Games in Salt Lake City
review: This was the first time I went to an escape room. We reserved and paid for tickets online. We picked the wizard escape room because it looked good for a beginner. Each of the family was able to participate in solving different puzzles so everyone had a great time. The people were very friendly and made this a great family experience! I would highly recommend this to anyone.
